A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite the fan hate\, Star Wars: The Last Jedi goes in bold and emotional new directions that will be remembered for a while. It's also extremely well directed and written. The perfomances are also brilliant as is the Score. I however do take issue with the Finn and Rose dynamic which wasted time and ruined a powerful moment. Luckily however\, all of the Rey\, Kylo and Poe plot was satisfying and this subplot eventually became entertaining. Overall\, without this plot-line\, it might be my favourite star Wars movie of the franchise\, but sadly\, it'll have to sit at second. Go see it\, it's fricking great: 9/10.
